mapper.delete: delete from cart where memId=#{memId} and prodId=#{prodId} and status=#{status}
mapper.select: select * from cart where memId=#{memId} and status=#{status} and prodId=#{prodId}
select prodId, sum(quantity) as total from cart group by prodId order by total desc

select p.prodThumImage, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, c.cartId, c.psize, c.quantity, c.cartDate, p.prodId from products p, (select * from cart where memId=#{memId} and status=#{status}) c where p.prodId = c.prodId
mapper.update: update cart set quantity=#{quantity}, psize=#{psize} where cartId=#{cartId}
update cart set status=#{status} where memId=#{memId} and prodId=#{prodId}
update cart set status=1 where memId=#{memId} and status=0
update cart set status=1 where cartId=#{cartId}
